Name: Update Azure PowerShell Module
Description: This Step Template will help you to update the Azure PowerShell Module version on any targeted tentacle. [Note: Windows PowerShell 5.0 installed as pre-requisites for this step template to work]

Parameters.Name: AzurePSModuleVersion
Parameters.Label: Azure PowerShell Version
Parameters.HelpText:
example : 2.2.0
Refer to find the version number : https://www.powershellgallery.com/items

Parameters.Name: ModuleName
Parameters.Label: PowerShell Module Name
Parameters.HelpText:
AzureRM
Refer for Module Name : https://www.powershellgallery.com/items
